script.title: check-cli-acl.slax
script.author: royklee
script.synopsis: Enforces a login-based CLI access from an authorized subnet only
script.description: This event script is to restrict the CLI access with a given login from an authorized subnet only. This can be easily extended to multiple subnets, or use 0.0.0.0/32 to deny any access. It uses jcs:parse-ip extension function.
